channel.title: [Class suggestion] Escort/Retainer
channel.description:
Escort - Blue Dragon Support Passive 1: Royal Support - You know who the Prince is. Passive 2: Sworn loyalty - You cannot be converted for the first 3 nights
Day Ability: Oversee - Learn who the Prince is jailing and listen in on the conversation (3 uses)
Night Ability 1: Watch over - Make the target immune to visits. Target is predetermined and is Prince by default. Does not give feedback to the target. (3 uses) Night Ability 2: Restructure - If your target is dead then you may select a new target. You may not chose the King.
Retainer - Unseen Support Passive: Royal Support - You know who the Prince is.
Day Ability: Oversee - Learn who the Prince is jailing, the unseen will listen in on the conversation (3 uses)
Night Ability 1: Detain - Remove all passive effects from the target until next night. (4 uses)
Night Ability 2: Sabatoge - If someone would have died to an attack they instead live. If that person would survive an attack they instead die anyways. (Unlimited)

item.title: [Class suggestion] Escort/Retainer
item.dc:creator: Devin_Colp
item.description:
I really like this idea, lets the n1 prince death not happen but also gives the unseen a really good convertible target that would swing the tide of the game in their favor if they convert him.
